data.quote: And now that you don't have to be perfect, you can be good.
data.author: John Steinbecks

data.quote: Forgive others, not because they deserve forgiveness, but because you deserve peace.
data.author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

data.quote: How lucky I am to have something that makes saying goodbye so hard.
data.author: Winnie the Pooh

data.quote: Sometimes you never realize the value of a moment until it becomes a memory.
data.author: Dr. Seuss

data.quote: Victory is going from defeat to defeat without a loss of enthusiasm.
data.author: Winston Churchill

data.quote: Extinction is the rule. Survival is the exception.
data.author: Carl Sagan
